con:assertion.name: XPath Match - Temperature Is Digit (using RegEx)

con:configuration.scriptText: import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder def holder = new XmlHolder(messageExchange.responseContentAsXml) def tempValue = holder["//ns1:Temperature"] as int assert tempValue > 30
